name: Pleklunki
description:
Pleklunki

Solo Team of myself for the 48 hour GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
Made in Gamemaker Studio.

Pleklunki is a game that is about getting to the golden die by sorting through a difficult maze using only the dice on you and the luck of the run to get you through. Meant to be fast arcade like experience.  

Randome Powers change the way your character controls and feels, and each die you pick up might act a bit different from one another. 

Controls:

Movement = W, A, S, D  or Arrow Keys

Jump = SPace

Interact Key = E

Shoot = Left Mouse Button

Melee Slash = Right Mouse Button

NOTES:

Wish I had more time to polish tutorial, but sound kicks in after. Learned a lot from this game jam especially because I usually do art instead of programming. Overall I had fun making this one.

First Time ever programming AI, surprised it worked. They use a state for attack, flee, and normal. End goal was to use sharers to make the screen look budged and flackery like an old Atari game on an old TV. This proved to be too complex.
